text: Usaile akasabata pani varsayo pheri aphno–aphno ksamata anusara kholaharu bagna thale, pheri paniko bhelale mathi cadheko kudala'i baga'era lagyo. Ra yastai phinja tyasa dhatuma pani uthihalcha juna agoma halera khari'e pachi abhusana va arkae (sajavataka) samana bandachan. Yastai kisimale allaha satya–asatyako udaharana prastuta gardacha, . Aba phija ta vyartha bha'era bagi halcha, parantu juna manchela'i pha'ida purya'une vastu cha, tyo prthvima adi rahancha. Allaha yastai udaharanako varnana gardacha
